document.full_text: tribune co bondholders led by hedge fund aurelius capital management on monday filed a revised bankruptcy reorganization plan for the media company, hoping to overcome objections by senior creditors.
document.title: tribune creditors propose revised bankruptcy plan
lines_and_colors: tribune co bondholders led by hedge fund aurelius capital management on monday filed a revised bankruptcy reorganization plan for the media company, hoping to overcome objections by senior creditors.
